title: Omar Cafe and Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Beer/Wine, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegan choices including mezze, salad, pasta, and the lentil soup. Vegans to inquire. Located in a tourist section next to the Cistern and near the Blue Mosque, the Hagia Sophia, and Cathedral Barri Gothic.
streetAddress: Alemdar Mahallesi Seftali, Sokak Unit 8, Sultanahmet
